A vindication of Lieut. Gen. Cromwell, and Com. Gen. Ireton, against the scandalous aspersions cast upon them in a posted libell signed by one Tompson. And likewise a true state of the case concerning the said Tompson. / By A.C. A. C.
[2], 6 p.
Printed for Laurence Chapman, London : 1647 [i.e. 1648]
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 7th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
